conflict_logical_20250722_225005_0.title: Plugin A safety contradiction
conflict_logical_20250722_225005_0.description: Plugin A is safe vs Plugin A caused memory corruption

evidence_for.content: Plugin A is safe and reliable
Plugin A passed all security tests

evidence_against.content: Plugin A caused memory corruption in session 1247
System instability detected after Plugin A activation

conflict_logical_20250722_225005_0.resolution_notes: Needs further investigation: Evidence confidence too close - need additional data

conflict_behavioral_20250722_225005_1.title: User preference complexity contradiction
conflict_behavioral_20250722_225005_1.description: The user prefers clarity vs The user praised complexity in latest interaction

evidence_for.content: User consistently requests simple, clear explanations
User feedback: 'I like when things are explained simply'

evidence_against.content: User praised complex technical analysis in yesterday's interaction

conflict_behavioral_20250722_225005_1.resolution_notes: Context-dependent resolution: User preferences may be context-dependent - both valid in different situations

conflict_temporal_20250722_225005_2.title: Learning approach evolution
conflict_temporal_20250722_225005_2.description: Structured learning preference contradicted by recent exploratory engagement

evidence_for.content: Structured learning approaches work best for me

evidence_against.content: High engagement with exploratory learning session
User requested 'let me figure this out myself'

conflict_temporal_20250722_225005_2.resolution_notes: Temporal evolution accepted: Natural evolution/learning over time - accept newer perspective
